H0.text: The roller coaster ride called Rita is located at which English theme park. Alton Towers

H1.text: The roller coaster ride called Rita is located at which English theme park. Thorpe Park

H2.text: The roller coaster ride called Rita is located at which English theme park. Chessington World of Adventures

H3.text: The roller coaster ride called Rita is located at which English theme park. ATROL

A4.text: Rita, formerly known as Rita: Queen of Speed, is a launched roller coaster located in the Dark Forest section of Alton Towers amusement park in Staffordshire Moorlands, England.
